quote: Lost time is never found again.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: It is not that we have a short time to live, but that we waste a lot of it.
author: Seneca

quote: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: One day you will wake up and there won’t be any more time to do the things you’ve always wanted. Do it now.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Time is what we want most but what we use worst.
author: William Penn

quote: The time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Time flies over us, but leaves its shadow behind.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: Time is the most valuable thing a man can spend.
author: Theophrastus

quote: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you’re the pilot.
author: Michael Altshuler

quote: Time will pass, and seasons will come and go.
author: Roy Bean

quote: Time is money.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Time is a great healer, but a poor beautician.
author: Lucille S. Harper

quote: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Time is the most precious thing a man can spend.
author: Theophrastus

quote: The only reason for time is so that everything doesn't happen at once.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Time changes everything except something within us which is always surprised by change.
author: Thomas Hardy

quote: Better three hours too soon than a minute too late.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Time and tide wait for no man.
author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quote: Time is a great teacher, but unfortunately it kills all its pupils.
author: Louis Hector Berlioz

quote: Time is what we want most, but what we use worst.
author: William Penn

quote: Time flies over us, but leaves its shadow behind.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: Time is the most valuable thing a man can spend.
author: Theophrastus
